name: Amulet of Eternal Fire
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pathetically.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.

This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
